price: ហើយចូរអ្នករំលឹកនាមនៃម្ចាស់របស់អ្នក និងត្រូវគោរព សក្ការៈចំពោះទ្រង់ដោយចិត្ដស្មោះស។
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlan
